## Biography
dris Abdulmumin is a graduate of BSc Computer Science and MSc IT security. Currently, he is a PhD Computer Science research fellow, investigating improved approaches to low resource neural machine translation. His strengths are in the area of programming (python, java, c#, c++ and secure web applications - html, asp.net and php), network and web application penetration testing, information security management, server and network secure configuration, social engineering techniques and digital forensics investigation. He has some good years of experience in class room teaching.
